definition: a form of erotic entertainment in which a dancer gradually undresses to music, get undressed
details:
noun
- a form of erotic entertainment in which a dancer gradually undresses to music
= example: a form of erotic entertainment in which a dancer gradually undresses to music
= synonyms: striptease, strip show
- an airfield without normal airport facilities

- artifact consisting of a narrow flat piece of material

- thin piece of wood or metal
- a sequence of drawings telling a story in a newspaper or comic book
= synonyms: comic strip, cartoon strip, funnies
- a relatively long narrow piece of something
= example: a relatively long narrow piece of something
verb
- get undressed
= synonyms: peel, undress, discase, uncase, unclothe, strip down, disrobe
- to remove someone's or one's own clothes

= synonyms: undress, divest, disinvest
- draw the last milk (of cows)
- take off or remove

- remove a constituent from a liquid
- remove the thread (of screws)
- lay bare

- remove substances from by a percolating liquid
= synonyms: leach
- remove the surface from
= example: remove the surface from
- strip the cured leaves from
= example: strip the cured leaves from
